title: Holmes and Marlowe

content:encoded:
This week on Case Closed, our hour of mystery begins with Sherlock Holmes in, The Blanched Soldier. That story originally aired August 4, 1959.

(27:45) The Adventures Of Philip Marlowe close this week’s episode with The Deep Shadow, his story from March 21, 1950.

Download CaseClosed808

Your support keeps Case Closed coming every week. If you’d like to help, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you.
